subject: Re: Eclipse is closed automatically when tried to add Junit
msgSnippet: Hi Thanks for the responses. 1. I do not find the file $yourworkspace/.metadata/.log I could see .metadata file but not .log file 2. JAVA version = HotSpot(TM)
messageBody:
Hi

Thanks for the responses.

1. I do not find the file $yourworkspace/.metadata/.log
I could see .metadata file but not .log file

2. JAVA version = HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.4.2_11-b06, mixed
mode)

Appreciate any input on this.

Thanks
Arches
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Anand Nene <anandn@...> wrote:
>
> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
> Hash: SHA1
>
>
> [06/15/2006 02:47 AM IST] arches73 wrote:
> > But as soon as I click "Add external JARs" it closes eclipse
> > window and comes out.
> >
> > Appreciate any input on this. Do I need to do any setups
> > or version mismatch..?
>
> What error is logged in this file?
> $yourworkspace/.metadata/.log
>
> Also are you using the correct VM version?
>
> You might want to checkout the README for Running Eclipse.
>
> Anand
>
> - --
> "I wonder if James can go ask them whether it was the handbrake
> or the foot brake." (On Irvine's brake 'problem')
